snippet: The jurors deliberated all day Tuesday and passed two notes with questions to the court; deliberations are set to resume on Wednesday.
abstract: Federal jury begins deliberations in trial of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev.
lead_paragraph: The jurors deliberated all day Tuesday and passed two notes with questions to the court; deliberations are set to resume on Wednesday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Boston Marathon Bombing Jury Continues Talks
